scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run build:configFiles && npm run build:extensions
scripts.build:production:
npm run build && cross-var rimraf $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir/local.settings.json && cross-var copyfiles package.json $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir && npm --prefix $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir install --production && cross-var echo "
Production build is ready in '$npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir'.
"
scripts.install:extensions: npm run build && cross-var func extensions install --prefix $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir && cross-var copyfiles -u 1 $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir/extensions.csproj $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_rootDir
scripts.install:extensions:force: npm run build && cross-var func extensions install --prefix $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir --force && cross-var copyfiles -u 1 $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir/extensions.csproj $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_rootDir
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:host & npm run watch
scripts.watch: tsc -w & cross-var onchange "$npm_package_config_azureFunctions_rootDir/**/*.json" "$npm_package_config_azureFunctions_rootDir/**/*.csproj" -- npm run build:configFiles
scripts.publish:update: npm run test && npm run build:production && cross-var echo "Publishing '$npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir' content to already deployed function app '$npm_package_name'" && cross-var func azure functionapp publish $npm_package_name --prefix $npm_package_config_azureFunctions_outDir
